job.title: Social Media Marketing Intern
job.description:
The Tease&nbsp;Media: Company BackgroundThe Tease is an inclusive digital media brand informed by insight, curiosity and commentary on all things hair, beauty and pop-culture. We keep professionals and consumers in-the-know and on-trend with smart, candid reporting, exclusive editorial content and podcasts.&nbsp;Position OverviewThe Tease Media team is seeking a Social Media Intern to support the day-to-day operations  for the brands social media platform in order to inspire and engage our audience, expand our reach and drive conversions.   The Social Media Intern Will  - Write, edit and produce highly engaging daily posts for each social platform, including Facebook, Instagram and TikTok   
  - Cultivate an engaged audience with high-touch communication with users across public platforms and in comment threads and DMs   
  - Maintain cross-platform and platform-specific editorial calendar for social media content   
  - Work with print, video, and design teams to develop cross-platform, traffic-driving social campaigns   
  - Seamlessly execute partnership programs on social and digital channels   
  - Monitor competitors’ social media presence, identify new opportunities, and leverage best practices.   
  - Write, edit and curate email marketing programming for paid and non-paid issues   
  - Ideate continued ways to innovate salon professional hair-related content to elevate the brand, including pitching of content series campaigns, salon professional partnerships (stylists/barbers), etc.   
  - Maintain upstanding relationships with brands and salon professionals to continue building awareness within the market   
  - Have experience with newsroom analytics tools, such as Chartbeat and Crowdtangle   
&nbsp;About You  - You have a keen eye and a creative, forward-thinking mindset   
  - You’re passionate about salon professional and beauty brands, stories, and design, and have a fascination with how to apply that passion across social platforms   
  - You love working with tight-knit entrepreneurial teams   
  - You have an understanding of industry trends, best practices, and emerging user behaviors.   
  - You are an enthusiastic, highly-organized creative producer with the ability to work independently as well as in a team environment   
  - You are a confident, skillful communicator
